name: places/ChIJD4wsQaRZwokRL1P8jE8oilE
formattedAddress: 41 W 25th St # 4, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 41 W 25th St # 4, New York, NY 10010-2085, USA

originalText.text:
UPDATE:  they finally responded to my cancelation request however 2 days laters they still shipped the items. On the shipping notification email the items are marked as refunded. Waiting on a response on sending the items back. I will not pay for return shipping

After no responses from their customer service I file a BBB complaint and dispute charge with my bank. I finally heard back and they canceled the order and issued a refund. Two days later I received a shipment notification. Again I wrote to the customers only to get the response that the order has shipped and no acknowledgement that the order was cancelled.

I placed an on line order Peanuts store that in Jan 19th and the item has not shipped yet. They items were for Valentines day and they will not arrive magically overnight. I have been trying to cancel my order and there is no response to email. They have a text message option but they do not respond to that the phone number listed on the site also go to a phone tree for 8 people but when you select a number automated voice response says that number is not valid. I was able to leave a voice mail for the CEO. I highly doubt that will get me anywhere.

originalText.text: I’m going to go along with what most said in their reviews. I ordered a USNWT jersey from a site they run. This was back in November. Got an email saying it was delayed. Then in Jan, I received a message that it was shipped according to the app ‘Shop’. There was no tracking number and never received the item. They won’t answer emails or calls. Buyer Beware!

Then in Jan, I received a message that it was shipped according to the app ‘Shop’. There was no tracking number and never received the item. They won’t answer emails or calls. Buyer Beware!

originalText.text: They are a scam!!!  They have a Peanuts website, I ordered a hoodie they took my money without sending it.  I received emails for one day stating there was a technical issue and they had to resend the order to the manufacturer. Didn’t hear from them after that.  It was supposed to be a Christmas gift.  Very disappointing!

text.text: They are a scam!!!  They have a Peanuts website, I ordered a hoodie they took my money without sending it.  I received emails for one day stating there was a technical issue and they had to resend the order to the manufacturer. Didn’t hear from them after that.  It was supposed to be a Christmas gift.  Very disappointing!

originalText.text: BUYER BEWARE!!!!!   The Official Peanuts Store is part of TWG Konnect.  I ordered a skating snoopy that looked horrible when it arrived.  After several emails they told me where to return it.  I did so but never got a refund.  I sent over a hundred emails and texts to their company only to get a sporadic email back on where to send my merchandise.  There is no contact telephone number.  This is possibly the worst company ever.

originalText.text: I ordered a hoodie from the Peanuts Official Store. They never sent it and won't respond to my emails. It says my order was fulfilled.
